content: धिष्ण्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} To be praised or meditated upon. {@--2@} Worthy of a high place. --ष्ण्यः {@--1@} A place for the sacrificial fire; अमी वेदिं परितः कॢप्तधिष्ण्याः <ls>Ś. 4. 7.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śukra, preceptor of the demons. {@--3@} The planet Venus. {@--4@} Power, strength. --ष्ण्यं {@--1@} A seat, an abode, site, place, house; न भौमान्येव धिष्ण्यानि हित्वा ज्योतिर्मयान्यपि <ls>R. 15. 59.</ls> {@--2@} A meteor. {@--3@} Fire ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} also). {@--4@} A star, an asterism.
